READ THESE INSTRUCTIONS FIRST <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 420, 718, 432]]<|/det|> Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 435, 325, 446]]<|/det|> Write in dark blue or black pen. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 449, 460, 461]]<|/det|> You may use a pencil for any diagrams or graphs. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 463, 598, 475]]<|/det|> Do not use staples, paper clips, highlighters, glue or correction fluid. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 477, 380, 488]]<|/det|> DO **NOT** WRITE IN ANY BARCODES. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 504, 283, 514]]<|/det|> Answer **all** the questions. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 518, 695, 558]]<|/det|> Give non-exact numerical answers correct to 3 significant figures, or 1 decimal place in the case of angles in degrees, unless a different level of accuracy is specified in the question. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 561, 590, 572]]<|/det|> The use of an electronic calculator is expected, where appropriate. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 575, 598, 586]]<|/det|> You are reminded of the need for clear presentation in your answers. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 602, 600, 613]]<|/det|> At the end of the examination, fasten all your work securely together. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 616, 695, 641]]<|/det|> The number of marks is given in brackets [ ] at the end of each question or part question. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 644, 438, 655]]<|/det|> The total number of marks for this paper is 80. <|ref|>table<|/ref|><|det|>[[712, 475, 907, 848]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[332, 876, 664, 888]]<|/det|> This document consists of 16 printed pages.

<|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[397, 73, 597, 90]]<|/det|>
Mathematical Formulae  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[437, 165, 559, 182]]<|/det|>
## 1. ALGEBRA  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 197, 240, 214]]<|/det|>
Quadratic Equation  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[117, 227, 382, 245]]<|/det|>
For the equation \(ax^{2} + bx + c = 0\)  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[421, 245, 572, 281]]<|/det|>
\[x = \frac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^{2} - 4ac}}{2a}\]  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 313, 228, 329]]<|/det|>
Binomial Theorem  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[243, 335, 752, 373]]<|/det|>
\[(a + b)^{n} = a^{n} + \binom{n}{1} a^{n - 1}b + \binom{n}{2} a^{n - 2}b^{2} + \ldots +\binom{n}{r} a^{n - r}b^{r} + \ldots +b^{n},\]  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[117, 383, 494, 416]]<|/det|>
where \(n\) is a positive integer and \(\binom{n}{r} = \frac{n!}{(n - r)!r!}\)  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[402, 482, 593, 499]]<|/det|>
## 2. TRIGONOMETRY  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 515, 156, 530]]<|/det|>
Identities  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[420, 545, 578, 610]]<|/det|>
\[\sin^{2}A + \cos^{2}A = 1\] \[\sec^{2}A = 1 + \tan^{2}A\] \[\csc^{2}A = 1 + \cot^{2}A\]  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 641, 241, 657]]<|/det|>
Formulae for \(\Delta ABC\)  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[404, 664, 590, 696]]<|/det|>
\[\frac{a}{\sin A} = \frac{b}{\sin B} = \frac{c}{\sin C}\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[402, 717, 593, 737]]<|/det|>
\[a^{2} = b^{2} + c^{2} - 2bc\cos A\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[440, 745, 557, 774]]<|/det|>
\[\Delta = \frac{1}{2} bc\sin A\]

<label>1</label>
